title: The Brave little toaster
brief_description: Let the brave little Toaster carry you away on an electrifying ride you will never forget. There’s laughs, there’s songs, there’s suspense and plenty of adventure as the little Toaster and his friends, the Vacuum Cleaner, the Clock Radio, the Electric Blanket and the Desk Lamp set off to find their young master after he mysteriously disappears. Breathtaking animation ensures this acclaimed tale of loyalty and courage is sure to brighten spirits and entertain for a long time to come. Based on the novel by Thomas M. Disch.
